class astrofetch.XPathFetch.XPathFetch(url)¶

Bases: astrofetch.Fetcher.Fetcher

fetch(source)¶

Fetches the content of the provided URL and saves it locally.

Parameters:source (str) – URL of the source of the content to be downloaded.
scrap(section)¶

Crawls the webpage and extracts the content associated with the elements desired.

Parameters:section (dict) – Dictionary with the tags of the information desired and it’s XPath notation path.
